name: Taiko Risshiden V DX
description:
A remaster of the classic “Taiko Risshiden V” with new features!

You take on the role of Toyotomi Hideyoshi and other real-life historical figures who lived through the war-torn 16th century Japan and aim to realize their dreams and ambitions. You can support your lord as a vassal, become a daimyo yourself and aim to unify the country, or even aim to become the number one as a ninja, a pirate, or a merchant. You can also become a doctor, a blacksmith, a tea ceremony master, or any other of the many available professions.

This HD remaster features more than 100 new characters, new scenarios, new events, new endings, new skills, and many other new elements and quality-of-life features such as an auto-save function and an ending list.

Enjoy your unique experience in the Warring States period!
